data.actual_result: The colour of the text is bit white shifted which makes it a bit hard to read.
data.expected_result: The colour of the text is like the one before.
data.short_description: The text in the expanded view of the Audit log is now more lighter which makes it more difficult to see on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme. - Open Audit log and expand an entry.
